KreuzmichAuth_AccessGroup.description: Name of your external source's group whose members are allowed in this wiki. Set null to allow any user authenticated by Kreuzmich.

KreuzmichAuth_BlockedGroup.description: Name of your external source's group whose members are not allowed in this wiki, even though being in the Access Group. Set null to unable this feature.

KreuzmichAuth_AdminGroup.description: Name of your external source's admin group whose members are always allowed to login, also to read internal articles in this wiki. Set null to allow any user authenticated by Kreuzmich.

KreuzmichAuth_City.description: Configure which Kreuzmich city/subdomain should be used by KreuzmichAuth.

KreuzmichAuth_HttpUser.description: Configure which HTTP username should be used for cURL by KreuzmichAuth.

KreuzmichAuth_HttpPwd.description: Configure which HTTP password should be used for cURL by KreuzmichAuth.

KreuzmichAuth_EnableExpired.description: Configure whether KreuzmichAuth should allow user accounts that are expired on Kreuzmich.
